name: Preserver

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in all battles by 17%

skills.name: Exhausting Assault
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 15% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Recuperate
skills.raw_description:
Places a 7.5% [Continuous Heal] buff and a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. The value of the [Shield] is proportional to this Champion's MAX HP.
Lvl. 2 Shield +5%
Lvl. 3 Shield +5%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Ice Blow
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

seo.description: Banner-Lords is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 33 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Hereditary Knights of Kaerok, the Banner Lords swear blindallegiance to King Tayba. His majesty has tasked them withwaging his war of expansion, and protecting the royaladministrators posted at Kaerok Castle. These fearsome knightswill let no soul pass without a royal scroll.

seo.description: Preserver is a rare def champion from the faction Banner-Lords doing force damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
